item.title: Here are your Xbox Game Pass games for the end of August
item.content:encoded:
Gears of War: Reloaded, Herdling, and Dragon Age: The Veilguard headline the games hitting Game Pass soon.

Xbox has announced the games coming to Xbox consoles and PC on Game Pass. The line-up for the second half of August includes big names such as Persona 4 Golden, Gears of War: Reloaded, and Dragon Age: The Veilguard. Neat looking indie game, Herdling, is also arriving day one on Game Pass.

Available Today

  • Blacksmith Master (Game Preview) (PC)
  • Game Pass Ultimate, PC Game Pass
  • Void/Breaker (PC)
  • Game Pass Ultimate, PC Game Pass

Coming Soon

  • Goat Simulator Remastered (Xbox Series X|S) – August 20
  • Now with Game Pass Standard
  • Persona 4 Golden (Cloud, Console, and PC) – August 20
  • Game Pass Ultimate, PC Game Pass, Game Pass Standard
  • Herdling (Cloud, PC, and Xbox Series X|S) – August 21
  • Game Pass Ultimate, PC Game Pass
  • Gears of War: Reloaded (Cloud, PC, and Xbox Series X|S) – August 26
  • Game Pass Ultimate, PC Game Pass
  • Dragon Age: The Veilguard (Cloud, PC, and Xbox Series X|S) – August 28
  • Game Pass Ultimate, PC Game Pass, EA Play

That's your list of new games coming to Game Pass Standard, Ultimate, and PC Game Pass this month.

This is a news-in-brief story. This is part of our vision to bring you all the big news as part of a daily live report.



https://www.eurogamer.net/here-are-your-xbox-game-pass-games-for-the-end-of-august

item.title: Switch 2 exclusive Kirby Air Riders has a release date and it's just three months away
item.content:encoded:
Nintendo is launching Kirby Air Riders exclusively for Nintendo Switch 2 on 20th November.

Nintendo has announced that Kirby Air Riders will release on 20th November. The game is an exclusive for the Nintendo Switch 2, and is a sort of follow-up to Kirby Air Ride, a GameCube game from 2003 that has gained a cult following in the years since. The new game is being developed by Bandai Namco and Sora.

The Air Riders release date news came during the special 45-minute Nintendo Direct focused on the game. Kirby Air Riders is directed by Masahiro Sakurai. If that name sounds familiar, it's probably because he was the director of Super Smash Bros. Ultimate on Switch, and he created Kirby.

The original Kirby Air Ride was notoriously not loved by everyone. Leading UK games magazine, Edge, awarded the game a less than positive 3/10 rating back in issue 127. IGN.com scored the game a similarly disappointing 5.2/10.

This is a news-in-brief story. This is part of our vision to bring you all the big news as part of a daily live report.



https://www.eurogamer.net/switch-2-exclusive-kirby-air-riders-has-a-release-date-and-its-just-three-months-away
